name: QUAVER (itch)
description:
IT IS A COLOR CHANGING GAME CALLED QUAVER!!!

PLAYER HAVE TO MOVE THE BALL AND COLLECT THE BLOCKS FROM IT....

WHILE MOVING IT'S COLOR WILL CONSTANTLY CHANGE BUT YOU HAVE TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU HAVE TO COLLECT THE BLOCKS FROM THE SAME COLOR AS OF THE BALL.

IT'S A INFINITE LOOP GAME SO SIT BACK PLAY AND ENJOY!!
